item.title: Relax
item.description:
Some days, you’ll be pulled into so many different directions that you won’t know what to do.

Take a step back and breathe.

Nothing is more important than inner peace.

Focus on one and only one thing and finish that.

No need to multitask. Delegate it.

item.title: Never Too Late
item.description:
Van Gogh started painting seriously at 27.

He created over 2000 artworks over a decade, most of which were created in the last 2 years of his life.

It’s never too late to start anything and become world class at it.

Van Gogh did it. You could do it too.
